api_list.name: Upscale endpoint
api_list.description: This request will pass an upscale factor as 2, 4 or 8 and an url for the source file
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upscale2.p.rapidapi.com/upscale"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upscale2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://upscale2.p.rapidapi.com/upscale"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upscale2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
